tool_description: Validates data export packages against regulatory requirements and organizational policies for compliance verification.
error_messages: Export package not found: The specified export_id does not exist or is inaccessible.
Validation failed: Export package does not meet regulatory requirements.
Unsupported regulation framework: Use a supported regulatory framework.
Incomplete data: Export package appears to be missing required data elements.
usage: Provide export_id from Export Generator Tool and appropriate regulation_framework. Returns comprehensive compliance validation results with any issues identified.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or warning

issues_found.description: List of compliance issues or violations identified

recommendations.description: Recommended actions to address any compliance gaps
